Here is the list of all Kamal Haasan movies.

Kamal Haasan is a highly acclaimed Indian film actor, director, producer, screenwriter, and politician. Born on November 7, 1954, in Tamil Nadu, India, Kamal Haasan has made significant contributions to the Tamil film industry, as well as to Indian cinema as a whole. He is known for his remarkable versatility and has portrayed a wide range of characters across different genres, including drama, action, and comedy.

With his exceptional acting skills and dedication to his craft, Kamal Haasan has won numerous awards, including several National Film Awards and Filmfare Awards. Apart from his successful film career, he has also been actively involved in social and political issues and founded his own political party, Makkal Needhi Maiam, in 2018. Kamal Haasan is widely regarded as one of the most influential and respected figures in Indian cinema.
